messages.title: STOP BREXIT
messages.content: People are fed up with the Brexit chaos. It has become a national embarrassment. Both Boris Johnson’s Conservative Party and Jeremy Corbyn’s Labour Party are determined to pursue Brexit. Lib Dems stand for a safe, strong economy and reputation. Every vote for the Liberal Democrats ensures better public services, including the NHS, and limits borrowing and debt. Like the majority of Woking, we need a Remain vote.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dem plan for 20,000 more teachers.
Will Forster will properly represent Woking and stop Brexit.
Lib Dems will also tackle the climate emergency.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Boris Johnson, Jeremy Corbyn, Brexit Party
mentions.tacticalSituation: This election in Woking is a two-horse race between the Conservatives and Lib Dems. Only Will Forster can stop the Brexit-Conservative Party alliance. The Lib Dems won Woking in the most recent European Parliamentary Elections. Many Labour and Green voters are working for Lib Dem Will Forster.

issues.health: Every vote for the Liberal Democrats ensures better public services, including the NHS, and limits borrowing and debt.

community.content: Will Forster will properly represent Woking and stop Brexit. If Brexit is stopped, the issues that face Woking are properly identified and tackled more effectively. Money can be saved from the NHS and schools and fighting climate change.

leaflet.personalStatement: Will Forster will be the strong, local champion Woking needs as its MP. Will Forster grew up in Woking and has served the community as a Borough and County Councillor. He is already a highly regarded local person representing Woking.

politicalExperience.achievements: Highly regarded local person representing Woking.

endorsements.endorsement: We recommend you vote for the Liberal Democrats candidate in Woking.

images.caption: Will Forster with supporters holding 'Stop Brexit' signs.
Will Forster holding Liberal Democrats sign.
